phases.phase_name: Robot approaches and picks up top plate
phases.description: The robot's gripper moves into position and grasps the top plate from the rack. The plate is lifted slightly, indicating the start of the removal process.

phases.phase_name: Robot rotates and removes plate from stack
phases.description: The robot rotates the plate to dislodge it from the stack, then lifts it completely out of the rack. The plate is now fully removed and held by the gripper.
The robot moves the plate downward and places it gently on the table surface, completing the task of removing the top plate from the rack.

summary: The robot successfully removes the top plate from a dish rack and places it on the table, demonstrating precise manipulation and placement.
